Articles.Content:
Hi there,

Is it any unity issue, some rocket science part of programming mods or general mod kraken?

1. Almost all mods use the unity black half transparent windows and KSP style is the not common option, why not opposite?

2. The mod windows transparency is not the nice feature, it makes both the mod output and the background unusable

3. MOST IMPORTANT - the mod windows doesnt prevent background items to be clicked so u can easy push the abort button or any other active button (science/fuel/engine) while trying to pointand click the foreground mod button

4. MOST IMPORTANT" - the mod inputs also doesnt catch the full focus and the background engine catches what u type in as well so u will warp when u type the dot and many others (del, backspace)

5. Tooltips tend to stick forever in some mods, please make tooltips an option to switch in ur mods

3 minutes ago, Rybikson said:

Almost all mods use the unity black half transparent windows and KSP style is the not common option, why not opposite?

Because the KSP style is ugly as crap!
